name: tazacore-enterprise
description: TazaCore Enterprise Platform - Production-ready full-stack platform with automated deployment & Human Resource Management

scripts.dev:full: bun run db:generate && bun run dev
scripts.dev:setup: bun run install:all && bun run db:generate && bun run db:migrate && bun run db:seed:master && bun run dev
scripts.dev:debug: concurrently "bun run dev:site" "cd api && bun run start:debug" --names "SITE,API" --prefix-colors "blue,red"
scripts.dev:reset: bun run db:migrate:reset && bun run db:seed:master && bun run dev
scripts.build: bun run clean:build && bun run db:generate && bun run build:api && bun run build:site
scripts.build:check: bun run type-check && bun run lint && bun run build
scripts.build:analyze: cd site && ANALYZE=true bun run build
scripts.install:all: bun install && cd site && bun install && cd ../api && bun install && cd ../shared && bun install
scripts.update:all: bun update && cd site && bun update && cd ../api && bun update && cd ../shared && bun update
scripts.audit: bun audit && cd site && bun audit && cd ../api && bun audit
scripts.audit:fix: bun audit --fix && cd site && bun audit --fix && cd ../api && bun audit --fix
scripts.clean: bun run clean:deps && bun run clean:build && bun run clean:cache
scripts.clean:all: bun run clean && rm -rf bun.lockb site/bun.lockb api/bun.lockb shared/bun.lockb
scripts.test: bun run test:api && bun run test:site
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "cd api && bun run test:watch" "cd site && bun run test:watch"
scripts.test:coverage: bun run test:api:coverage && bun run test:site:coverage
scripts.lint: bun run lint:api && bun run lint:site
scripts.lint:fix: bun run lint:fix:api && bun run lint:fix:site
scripts.format: bun run format:api && bun run format:site
scripts.type-check: bun run type-check:api && bun run type-check:site
scripts.db:migrate:deploy: cd shared && bun prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:migrate:reset: cd shared && bun prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.db:migrate:status: cd shared && bun prisma migrate status
scripts.db:push: cd shared && bun prisma db push
scripts.db:pull: cd shared && bun prisma db pull
scripts.docker:clean: docker system prune -af && docker volume prune -f
scripts.docker:reset: bun run docker:down && bun run docker:clean && bun run docker:up
scripts.security:scan: bun audit && cd site && bun audit && cd ../api && bun audit
scripts.logs: tail -f site/logs/*.log api/logs/*.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No log files found'
scripts.backup: bun run db:backup && tar -czf backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).tar.gz site/public/uploads
scripts.db:inspect: cd shared && bun prisma db pull && bun prisma format
scripts.db:reset:hard: bun run docker:down && docker volume prune -f && bun run docker:up && sleep 10 && bun run db:migrate && bun run db:seed:master
scripts.fresh: bun run clean:all && bun run install:all && bun run db:generate && bun run dev
scripts.fresh:seed: bun run clean:all && bun run install:all && bun run db:generate && bun run db:migrate && bun run db:seed:master && bun run dev
scripts.reset: bun run db:migrate:reset && bun run db:seed:master
scripts.setup: bun run install:all && bun run db:generate && bun run db:migrate && bun run db:seed:master
scripts.ci: bun run install:all && bun run lint && bun run type-check && bun run test && bun run build
scripts.precommit: bun run lint:fix && bun run format && bun run type-check

author: TazaCore Team
